      • checkPassword

        public int checkPassword(java.lang.String pwd)
        Method checks the supplied string to match the following conditions : 1. The password must be at least 20 character long 2. the password must contain a digit ( 0-9 ) 3. the digit must be preceded by some non-numeric character 4. the end of the password must be a date of format DD/MM/YYYY HH:MMyes there is a space in between and all the digits must be present. Digits occurring in this part of the password are not considered as satisfiability condition of rule 2. 5. If there is a $ sign before the first numeric digit occurs, the password is invalid
        Parameters:
        pwd - This input string is checked
        Returns:
        0 if true else 1
